title.connectWallet: Connect a wallet to start using Venus

walletList.termsOfServiceLink: By connecting a wallet, you agree to Venus' <anchor>Terms of Service<anchor>.

claimXvsRewardButton.successMessage: You've successfully claimed your XVS reward
claimXvsRewardButton.title: Claim <Icon/> {{amount}}

errors.internal: An internal error occurred: {{errorMessage}}. Please try again later.

accountError.description: Please connect your wallet to set an asset as collateral.
accountError.title: Account Required

collateralDisableError.description: There was a problem disabling {{assetName}} as a collateral. Please try again.
collateralDisableError.title: Collateral Disable Error

collateralEnableError.description: There was a problem enabling {{assetName}} as a collateral. Please try again.
collateralEnableError.title: Collateral Enable Error

collateralRequired.description: Please repay all borrowed assets or set other assets as collateral.
collateralRequired.title: Collateral Required

myAccount.apyWithXvsTooltip: Choose whether to include the XVS distribution APY in calculations
myAccount.netApyTooltip: Percentage of your total supply balance received as yearly interests

progressBar.accessibilityLabel: Representation of the current state of your account
progressBar.borrowLimitTooltip: Current borrow balance:<LineBreak/>{{borrowBalance}} ({{borrowLimitUsedPercentage}} of your borrow limit)
progressBar.safeBorrowLimitTooltip: Safe borrow limit:<LineBreak/>{{safeBorrowLimit}} ({{safeBorrowLimitPercentage}}% of your borrow limit)

myAccount.safeLimitTooltip: {{safeBorrowLimitPercentage}}% of your borrow limit. We consider borrowing above this threshold unsafe.
myAccount.title: My account

supplyWithdraw.connectWalletToSupply: Please connect your wallet to supply
supplyWithdraw.connectWalletToWithdraw: Please connect your wallet to withdraw
supplyWithdraw.enableToSupply: To supply {{symbol}} to the Venus Protocol, you need to enable it first.
supplyWithdraw.enableToWithdraw: To withdraw {{symbol}} to the Venus Protocol, you need to enable it first.
supplyWithdraw.enterValidAmountSupply: Enter a valid amount to supply
supplyWithdraw.enterValidAmountWithdraw: Enter a valid amount to withdraw
